title: Trump Says He Would Protect Women ‘Whether Women Like It Or Not’
description: Former President Donald Trump said at his rally in Green Bay, WI that he would “protect” women “whether the women like it or not,” remarks that that risk losing him more support from female voters in the final stretch of his campaign. What do you think? The post Trump Says He Would Protect Women ‘Whether Women Like It Or Not’ appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: Former President Donald Trump said at his rally in Green Bay, WI that he would “protect” women “whether the women like it or not,” remarks that that risk losing him more support from female voters in the final stretch of his campaign. What do you think?
text: Former President Donald Trump said at his rally in Green Bay, WI that he would “protect” women “whether the women like it or not,” remarks that that risk losing him more support from female voters in the final stretch of his campaign. What do you think? “I said the same exact thing when I got my green belt in karate.” Paul Trapani, Snack Consultant “When has Kamala ever promised to do something I don’t want?” Matt Baber, Cat Sitter “He has such a way with threatening words.” Wanda Lomax, Allergy Inducer
html:
Former President Donald Trump said at his rally in Green Bay, WI that he would “protect” women “whether the women like it or not,” remarks that that risk losing him more support from female voters in the final stretch of his campaign. What do you think?

“I said the same exact thing when I got my green belt in karate.”

Paul Trapani, Snack Consultant

“When has Kamala ever promised to do something I don’t want?”

Matt Baber, Cat Sitter

“He has such a way with threatening words.”

Wanda Lomax, Allergy Inducer
